mapper.insert: INSERT INTO support_form(name, phone, problem, status) VALUES(#{name}, #{phone}, #{problem}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT ud.user_id AS user_id, ud.device_id AS device_id, dn.name AS device_name, ud.role AS role FROM userDevice ud, deviceName dn WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND ud.status = 1 AND dn.device_id = ud.device_id

SELECT ud.user_id, ud.device_id, dn.device_name, ds.pm25, ds.temperature, ds.humidity, ds.hcho, ds.co2, ds.velocity, ds.power, ds.workmode, ds.uv, ds.heat, ds.light, ds.cycle, ds.time FROM userDevice ud, deviceName dn, deviceStatus ds WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND ud.device_id = dn.device_id AND ud.device_id = ds.device_id AND ud.status = 1

SELECT device_id, pm25, temperature, humidity, hcho, co2, velocity, power, workmode, uv, heat, light, cycle, time FROM deviceStatus ds WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM userDevice WHERE user_id = #{userID}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM deviceStatus ds2 WHERE ds2.time > ds.time AND ds2.device_id = ds.device_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userDevice(user_id, device_id, role) VALUES(#{userID}, #{deviceID}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, device_id, role FROM userDevice WHERE status = 1 AND user_id = #{userID} AND device_id = #{deviceID}
SELECT device_id, name, phone, address, province_id, city_id, version FROM deviceName WHERE device_id = #{deviceID}
mapper.update: UPDATE userDevice SET status = 0 WHERE device_id = #{deviceID} AND user_id = #{userID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deviceName(device_id, name, phone, province_id, city_id, address) VALUES(#{deviceID}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{provinceID}, #{cityID}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT token, device_id, owner_id, role, status, auth_id, expire_time FROM deviceShareCode WHERE token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deviceShareCode(token, device_id, owner_id, role, expire_time) VALUES (#{token}, #{deviceID}, #{ownerID}, #{role}, #{expireTime})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.consumer_wechat AS consumer_wechat, ud.device_id AS device_id, ci.consumer_id AS consumer_id, ud.role AS role FROM consumer_info ci, userDevice ud WHERE ud.device_id = #{deviceID} AND ud.user_id = ci.consumer_id AND ud.status = 1
SELECT city_pinyin FROM user_location WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND status = 1
